ComicInfo.Summary:
THE INEVITABLE FUTURE.
The revolutionary tale of Mutantkind's rise comes to a conclusion that will lay the groundwork of the X-Men's stories for years to come! Superstar writer Jonathan Hickman (AVENGERS, FANTASTIC FOUR, SECRET WARS) and Marvel Young Gun artist Pepe Larraz (EXTERMINATION, AVENGERS) wrap the series that changes everything!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------|------------------| | Reg | Regular Cover | Pepe Larraz & Marte Gracia | 1 | | Var | Variant Cover | Mike Huddleston | 3 | | Var | Flower Variant Cover (Apocalypse) | Sara Pichelli & Dean White | 4 | | Var | Character Through the Decades Variant Cover (Nightcrawler) | Iban Coello & Nolan Woodard | 5 | | Var | Foreshadow Variant Cover (Omega Red) | Giuseppe Camuncoli | 6 | | Var | Connecting Variant Cover | Javi Garron & Rachelle Rosenber | 7 | | Var | Action Figure Variant Cover (Gambit - '90s Blue Team) | John Tyler Christopher | 8 | | Var | Young Variant Cover | Skottie Young | 9 | | Var | Virgin Variant Cover | Pepe Larraz & Marte Gracia | 10 | | 2nd | Second Printing Variant Cover | Pepe Larraz | 2 |
